ThingDef.label: Ritual: Psionic Lich
ThingDef.description:
Performs the ritual to transform the gifted or adept pawn into an undead lich gaining an immortal existence and psionic power.
Psionic liches are undead psionics users—usually psions, but sometimes psionic monsters—who have interred their mentality into the necrotic tissue of their once-living bodies, thus preserving their existence indefinitely.
